about_me_description: I am a web developer. I am passionate about technology and I love learning new technologies. I love working in a team and sharing my knowledge with others.
education_description:
Back in 2019 I graduated as a Software Development Engineer. I learned from the excellent teachers of \
        this institution the basics of object-oriented programming, concurrent programming, databases, operating systems, \
        introduction to artificial intelligence, among other things. I had the opportunity to work with Python, Java, C#, C++, SQL, \
        HTML, CSS, Processing, among others.

vtimes.description:
Here I learned to work with VueJS in its version 2, as well as learning to use AWS services. I learned design \
        patterns such as Builder, Factory, Singleton, among others. I learned to work with SQL Server, providing maintenance and creating \
        new procedures. I also learned a little about Wordpress and how to create Landing pages.
activities: PHP, Laravel, Wordpress and VueJS development
Management and creation of new design patterns for backend
Management and creation of new stored procedures in SQL Server
Windows server and AWS EC2 deployment
Security SSL certificates update and automation
vtimes.organiwork_description: Payroll system for personnel administration, records, positions, salaries and benefits.
vtimes.modern_restaurant_description: Restaurant management POS system, real-time orders and inventory management

um.description: In this job I had the oportinity of working in the studens inscription process and updating of data.
um.sium_description: Student information system for the administration of students, grades, teachers and subjects.

ich.description:
In this enterprise I worked in a big team of software development. My main roll was design and develop graphic interfaces  \
            for web application and mobile apps in AngularJS and IONIC.
activities: Design and development of graphic interfaces.
ich.redich_description: Job board for the administration of job offers, resumes and job applications.

contractflow.title: ContractFlow
contractflow.short_description: Contract management system for clients, suppliers and users with multitenancy architecture.

app_salon.title: App Salón
app_salon.short_description: Barbershop sales system for appointment and user management developed with the MEVN stack.

lobo.title: Lobo electoral
lobo.short_description: Candidate management system for a political party voters. This was my first development completely from 0 to deployment to production.

codeigniter.title: Codeigniter for beginers.
codeigniter.short_description: Learn how to build quickly full featured apps with one of the most popular PHP MVC Framwork, .
codeigniter.learning:
This course tougth me the main diferences between Codeigniter 3 and Codeigniter 4. I learned how to work with databases, \
            to create controllers, models and views, to work with routes, create forms and work with sessions.

vue.title: Vue.js The complete guide
vue.short_description: Learn Vue.js by creating real projects with Pinia, Composition API, Vue Router SFC, Vuetify, Firebase, Composables, APIs.
vue.learning:
In this course I learned to work with Vue 3, to create components, to work with routes, to create forms, to work with \
            Pinia, to create services, to work with Firebase, to create composables, to work with APIs, to create Single File Components, to work \
            with Tailwindcss, to work with Vuetify, to work with Composition API, to improve my designs.

laravel.title: PHP con Laravel
laravel.short_description: Learn Laravel 8 from scratch, build web applications with the most popular PHP Framework.
laravel.learning:
In this course I learned to improve my programming with Laravel, although the course is started in laravel 8 and focused on version 9, while I was following it \
            I learned to work with Laravel 11, to create controllers, models, use dependency injection, to work with routes, to work with middlewares, to work with \
            Eloquent, polymorphic relationships, local and global scopes, queues, events among other things.

laravel_websockets.title: Realtime y Laravel
laravel_websockets.short_description: Learn how to use Laravel Websockets to create real time apps.
laravel_websockets.learning:
In this course I learned to work with Laravel Websockets, to create channels, to work with events, as well as to publish my own websockets server in \
            a server based on Ubuntu with Nginx and Supervisor.

python.title: Universidad Python
python.short_description: Learn Python from scratch, build console and web apps from the most popular programming language.
python.learning:
In this course I improved my knowledge in Python, I learned to work with Flask, to work with Django, to work with REST, to work with APIs, to work with \
            interfaces, decorators, and have the best practices.

chatgpt.title: Ingeniería de promots de ChatGPT para desarrolladores
chatgpt.short_description: Learn how to improve yout prompts and to build a chatbot using OpenAI API.
chatgpt.learning:
In this course I learned to work with OpenAI, to work with GPT-3, to work with Python, and it taught me to improve my queries and better understand artificial intelligence. \
            I had the opportunity to develop a small chat with the OpenAI API to interact with the user.
